pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors Hydraplenish Ultimate Hydration DuoPearl Serum 20ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Super skin hydrator clinically proven to reduce the appearance of skin ageing by 10 years in 2 weeks. Powered by the latest Microfluidics Pearl Technology, Skin Doctors HydraPlenish DuoPearl Serum delivers a breakthrough skin-quenching serum for ultimate deep hydration.

Our blue hydrating pearls are clinically proven to lock in moisture and intensively hydrate and preserve the skin's natural water.

Our white Probiotic microbiome protecting pearls help balance and protect the skin from external ageing factors.

Both pearls are encapsulated and protected in a super-hydrating hyaluronic acid serum that is activated on skin for maximum impact and resutls.

General Information

Skin Doctors HydraPlenish DuoPearl Serum is a super skin hydrator clinically proven to reduce the appearance of skin ageing by 10 years in 2 weeks.

Powered by the latest Microfluidics Pearl Technology, Skin Doctors HydraPlenish delivers a breakthrough skin-quenching serum for ultimate deep hydration.

Suspended in a nourishing hyaluronic gel are Hydractin-LMF™ encapsulated Pearls. This hydrating active is so powerful it's clinically proven to lock in moisture and intensively hydrate and preserve skin's natural water reserves deep within the epidermis. Our moisture-locking Pearl works in perfect synergy with the Probiotic Pearl to help balance the skin.

Only activated on contact, Skin Doctor's HydraPlenish deeply nourishes and saturates the skin, creating extraordinary results. Skin Doctor's HydraPlenish is clinically proven to turn back the epidermal clock by 10 years in two weeks to:
• Improve skin hydration 48.2%
• Improve skin firmness 88%
• Increase skin elasticity 112%
• Reduce skin roughness by 58%
Skin appears to be brimming with moisture, erasing the visible signs of fatigue and age, and the complexion imparts a natural dewy glow.

Size: 20mL

Warnings

Always patch test 24 hours within intended area before use, if irritation occurs discontinue use. Do not use on broken or irritated skin. Avoid contact with eyes, in the event of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water. Keep away from children.

Ingredients

Aqua, Glycerin, Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Lactobacillus Ferment, Cetraria Islandica Thallus Extract, Polypodium Vulgare Rhizome Extract, Sphagnum Magellanicum Extract, Saccharide Isomerate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polysorbate-20, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Calcium Alginate, Gellan Gum, Agar, 1,2-Hexanediol, Maltodextrin, Fragrance, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Triethanolamine, CI 77019, CI 77891, CI 74160.

Directions

1. Cleanse face and neck
2. Apply Skin Doctors HydraPlenish DuoPearl Serum over face and neck, massage in
3. Apply other Skin Doctors treatment products
4. Complete with Skin Doctors Supermoist™ to protect the skin
5. Use morning and night for best results

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.
